paper_title: High-throughput discovery of novel hybrid metal-organic frameworks for carbon capture

claims.claim: The ML-predicted CO2 adsorption capacity of MOF-74(Zn) is 7.2 mmol/g at 298K and 1 bar.
claims.context: Using grand canonical Monte Carlo simulations with UFF4MOF force field parameters
instruction: Check output/adsorption.txt; CO2 capacity should be 7.2 ± 0.3 mmol/g

claims.claim: DFT calculations show a bandgap of 3.2 eV for the synthesized perovskite structure.
The ionic conductivity reaches 8.4 mS/cm at 300K for the Li10GeP2S12 structure.

non_reproducible_claims.claim: The synthesized material shows 95% capacity retention after 1000 charge-discharge cycles.
non_reproducible_claims.reason: Requires physical battery assembly and electrochemical testing equipment that cannot be computationally reproduced

non_reproducible_claims.claim: XRD patterns confirm single-phase formation with no impurities detected.
non_reproducible_claims.reason: Requires physical synthesis and X-ray diffraction measurements on actual materials

non_reproducible_claims.claim: The material synthesis yield was 78% using the solid-state reaction method.
non_reproducible_claims.reason: Depends on specific laboratory conditions, equipment, and operator technique that vary between facilities
